Reviews.Title: Good enough
Reviews.Author: J. Eaves "mother of 4"
Reviews.Content: we got this system for our home. The installation is easy enough if you dont mind taking lots of time running the cords so you dont run them over with a lawnmower or weed eater lol. Make sure you have long enough cords. And if you have to buy extra, you need to buy the adapters that connect them together. I suggest getting a wireless system if you dont have a lot of time or no one else to run the cords for you. The set up is easy to understand however. The picture quality is ok. Not the best but it works good enough. The night vision is ok too. Does the job. The dvr is hard to learn how to use. Now that I looked around I think I could have gotten it a little cheaper somewhere else. Oh well, we needed it asap.
